name: Iruka Iru Ka
description:
Iruka Iru Ka (JP: 海豚いるか EN: Is there a Dolphin?) is a japanese word pun turned into a game. Somewhere in these caves there is a dolphin. It is up to you to find it deep into the hollow cave. But you have a limited air supply, unless you can find that dolphin before the time is up it's game over! You have 3 beacons you can deploy per level to help you mark areas, as well as extra time pick ups. Keyboard Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Mouse - Look around
  • B - Drop Beacon
  • L - Toggle Light
